mentions.textExcerpt: Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again.
Maël raised an eyebrow in regret, somewhat helplessly.
Maël stood up, picked up a few soccer balls, and walked to the field with his already separating shoes.
Maël stopped, sweating profusely, and turned to see a tall, bald middle-aged man waving at him from a distance.
Maël felt both embarrassed and grateful.
Maël took the shoes, thanked him, and walked back to the field.
Maël quickly immersed himself in the shooting drills, carefully feeling the feedback from each successful shot and the experience from each failed attempt.
Maël suddenly stopped, stunned.
Maël ran to the goal area to retrieve the ball. This time, his steps were particularly strong, and his face lit up with a newfound vigor.
A voice beside him spoke. It was Carl, the French defender on the team, who sounded very dejected.
Carl looked around at the young players in Arsenal jerseys and shook his head.
Maël stopped, sweating profusely, and turned to see a tall, bald middle-aged man waving at him from a distance.
Hans, the Head Coach of Arsenal U17.
Hans’s eyes immediately focused on Maël’s feet.
Hans smiled and turned to search through a shoe rack.
Hans quickly handed him a bag with a pair of shoes and laughed heartily.
Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field.
Looking at the brand-new shoes on the feet of his peers, Maël felt a twinge of envy.
Maël stood up, picked up a few soccer balls, and walked to the field with his already separating shoes.
Maël stopped his training and walked toward the coach’s office.
Maël took the shoes, thanked him, and walked back to the field.
Back at the goal area, he put on the new shoes and resumed his shooting practice.
Carl looked around at the young players in Arsenal jerseys and shook his head.
Hans, the Head Coach of Arsenal U17.
Fortunately, the original owner had some talent and received an invitation to trial with the Arsenal Youth Team six months ago, for a six-month period.
Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again.
Maël stood up, picked up a few soccer balls, and walked to the field with his already separating shoes.
The sound of his shoes slapping the ground grew louder as the sole continued to separate and slap back against his feet.
Hans’s eyes immediately focused on Maël’s feet.
Hans quickly handed him a bag with a pair of shoes and laughed heartily.
Back at the goal area, he put on the new shoes and resumed his shooting practice.
Who knew that the angry drinking session after the Chinese National Football Team’s 0-7 loss to Japan a few days ago would be his swan song in that timeline.
Maël suddenly stopped, stunned.
Fortunately, as a former internet enthusiast, he had seen a lot and quickly ventured a guess. 'System?'
It seemed that as long as he continued to practice specific skills, his proficiency would increase, and once it reached 100%, he would level up?

entityDetails.name: Maël
entityDetails.description: A young soccer player from Southern France with Chinese ancestry, who is on a six-month trial with Arsenal U17.
entityDetails.physicalTraits: 181 cm tall, 70 kg, average physical strength and speed
entityDetails.motivations: Desperately wants to stay at Arsenal and continue his soccer career; determined to make the most of his remaining time
entityDetails.notes: Has a mystical experience where he sees a system notification about his shooting skill; feels both envy and determination when comparing his shoes to his peers'

entityDetails.name: Carl
entityDetails.description: A French defender on the Arsenal U17 team, also on a six-month trial period.
entityDetails.motivations: Worried about his future if he doesn’t get a contract extension; feels dejected about the intense competition
entityDetails.status: Alive, discussing his future with Maël
entityDetails.notes: Expresses concern about his contract expiring and the difficulty of finding another club

entityDetails.name: Hans
entityDetails.description: The Head Coach of Arsenal U17, who notices Maël’s worn-out shoes and offers him a pair of his own.
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Coach of the Arsenal U17 team
entityDetails.motivations: Wants to help Maël continue his training; observant and kind
entityDetails.notes: Notices Maël’s shoes and lends him a pair of his own; encourages Maël to try them on the field

entityDetails.name: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground
entityDetails.description: The training facility for Arsenal's youth teams, where Maël and his peers practice.
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Location of the U17 training sessions
entityDetails.notes: Includes the U17 Training Field where Maël practices his shooting

entityDetails.name: Arsenal U17
entityDetails.description: The youth team of Arsenal Football Club, where Maël and Carl are on trial.
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Faction Maël and Carl are part of
entityDetails.motivations: To identify and develop talented young players
entityDetails.notes: Highly competitive; players are on trial periods and must perform to stay

entityDetails.name: Soccer Shoe
entityDetails.description: The footwear used by Maël and his peers during training.
entityDetails.physicalTraits: Maël’s shoes are worn out and separating at the sole; Hans’s shoes are clean and unused except for training
entityDetails.notes: Maël’s shoes are a source of frustration and envy; Hans’s shoes are a symbol of support and kindness

entityDetails.name: Chinese National Football Team
entityDetails.description: The national soccer team of China, which suffered a 0-7 loss to Japan.
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Mentioned as the reason for Maël’s original timeline ending
entityDetails.notes: Their loss led to Maël’s drinking session and subsequent time travel

entityDetails.name: System
entityDetails.description: A mystical system that appears to Maël, showing his skill levels and providing feedback on his training.
entityDetails.roleInChapter: Concept that appears to Maël during his training
entityDetails.motivations: To help Maël improve his skills and reach higher levels
entityDetails.notes: Displays a notification about Maël’s Long Shot skill; suggests that continuous practice will lead to improvement

relationships.contextExcerpt: Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again.
Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field.
Fortunately, the original owner had some talent and received an invitation to trial with the Arsenal Youth Team six months ago, for a six-month period.
Maël raised an eyebrow in regret, somewhat helplessly. 'If we don’t get a contract extension by July 1st, we’ll both be on our way out.'
Hans, the Head Coach of Arsenal U17, called Maël to his office and offered him a pair of shoes.
Hans quickly handed him a bag with a pair of shoes and laughed heartily. 'Go try them on the field and see if they fit. I have some work to do.'
Suddenly, a few lines of deep black text appeared before his eyes.
Maël suddenly stopped, stunned. Fortunately, as a former internet enthusiast, he had seen a lot and quickly ventured a guess. 'System?'
Carl, the French defender on the team, who sounded very dejected. 'Mine is only six months, and it’s about to expire.'
Hans, the Head Coach of Arsenal U17, called Maël to his office.
Who knew that the angry drinking session after the Chinese National Football Team’s 0-7 loss to Japan a few days ago would be his swan song in that timeline.

events.name: End of Training Session
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.timeReference: June 10, 2010, end of the day's training
events.outcome: Maël and Carl discuss their uncertain futures with the team
events.contextExcerpt: Two long whistles signaled the end of the day's training. Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again.

events.name: Maël's Shoe Dilemma
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël contemplates the state of his shoes and his financial situation
events.contextExcerpt: Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again. It’s probably time to retire them.

events.name: Discussion with Carl
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Both express their concerns about their trial periods ending
events.contextExcerpt: Maël, how long is your trial period? Mine is only six months, and it’s about to expire.

events.name: Maël's Extra Practice
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël decides to practice more shots to improve his chances
events.contextExcerpt: I’m going to practice some more shots. Maël stood up, picked up a few soccer balls, and walked to the field with his already separating shoes.

events.name: Meeting with Coach Hans
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Coach’s Office
events.outcome: Hans offers Maël a pair of his own shoes
events.contextExcerpt: Maël! Come to my office for a moment. Maël stopped, sweating profusely, and turned to see a tall, bald middle-aged man waving at him from a distance.

events.name: Receiving New Shoes
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Coach’s Office
events.outcome: Maël receives a pair of Hans' shoes and feels grateful
events.contextExcerpt: What size shoes do you wear? Hans’s eyes immediately focused on Maël’s feet. I have a few pairs I don’t use anymore. I can lend you one.

events.name: Discovery of the System
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël discovers a system that tracks his skill proficiency
events.contextExcerpt: Suddenly, a few lines of deep black text appeared before his eyes. [Skill: Long Shot Level 1] [Proficiency: (34/100)]
